item.title: My Life Goals and the Plan to Implement Them Using the 12 Week Year
item.description: One of the things that I want to improve through practice is structuring my work. Planning every week and day, keeping a productivity journal and using a task manager for all my projects has helped. I have advanced a lot in structuring and I’m now working to take it another step further with the implementation of a long term vision. An important part of planning is prioritization, and for me this is intimately linked to your vision for the future.
